channel.title: #1 Delta source [No retarded things added][Cleanest one of all]
channel.description:
Cleaned delta scape source
This is by far the cleanest source for delta scape users, it run INCREDIBLY smooth Runs alright with a localhost with a mediocre computer, no lag with a cheep VPS
Notable Features
- Everything DeltaScape has - Grahams EventManager - Full Indentation across all classes - Removed over 1500 dead code fragments - Follows 100% Convention across classes (Except for the basic packaging + method names(way to many to refactor)) - Has multiple notorious Delta-Bugs Fixed - Runs ALOT smoother then regular DeltaScape - Has tips and guides on how to edit basic things for beginners - Works with most clients (Galkons refactored etc) - Will hold at least 40% more players then an average Delta Scape - Re-made Trading - X log fixes - Common Dupes fixed
Credits
ẨřЌαdĩαņ J Dog Jonny J b a l l a Graham Delta Java' Blakeman8192 mmaKush rolls
Other stuff you should know
I did spend allot of time editing it so that it would run smoother, I wasn't aiming to make the files smaller at all, i think there the same size [which is grate] I think that only in the next update will I aim to remove 2000 dead lines.
I plan on making it the smallest and smoothest delta possibly, the only reason why i'm releasing it, is because am bored of coding and not noticing any server differences [Like adding NPC's and other stuff] and i would like to see if my work is appreciated!
Download link: http://sharecash.org/download.php?file=175109 *See, the sub-division of this forums said nothing about cash share links, until it said that i'm not going to remove it!
I'm not going to make you fill in information for the client because an not a dick and because it's just bluurs client...
If this is a big it, you can count on getting a cleaned client, with updates on the cleaned source
I do not use delta, and I am not responsible for anything you do with the files, Delta still needs alot of work done on it for it to be better than Devo
also alot more poeple use delta than Devo so this is for you!
